dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3966 IH: To provide transportation of dependent patients relating to obstetrical anesthesia services.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To provide transportation of dependent patients relating to obstetrical anesthesia services.

section.header: To provide transportation of dependent patients relating to obstetrical anesthesia services

subsection.text: Section 1040(a)(2) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking subparagraph (F).
